review: What a complete joke. This POS wouldn't connect to the internet no matter what I tried. All my other devices connected just fine. I got online and phone support from Amazon and I did everything they told me to do and it still didnt work. Then they tell me my wireless router needs to be within 2.5 feet of the stick for optimal performance?! Wtf is the point of wireless? Not to mention it said signal strength excellent but still wouldn't connect. After searching online, apparently this is a common problem. Nice job Amazon of having a junk product you don't fix. Save your time and go with Chromecast.
